RelatedSentence: Deputy Police Commissioner - General Pol Gen Worapong Chiewpreecha has instructed police to step up security of residences of caretaker ministers .
Deputy Police Commissioner - General Pol Gen Worapong Chiewpreecha has instructed police to step up security of residences of caretaker ministers .
The security has been heightened for the ministers after the People 's Democratic Reform Committee vowed to dispatch protesters to hound them to pressure them to resign .

RelatedSentence: Worapong also recruited provincial police from provinces that are strongholds of the Pheu Thai to form teams to try to arrest 30 leaders of the People 's Democratic Reform Committee , who are now wanted by arrest warrants .
